name: 神探福爾摩斯 （小說與電影）
description: This course intends to introduce to students selected canonical works of Sherlock Holmes short stories and novels.  We will also watch film adaptations of Sherlock Holmes stories.  The major issues we will discuss include, among others, London, East End, opium dens, sailors, adventure stories, crime fiction, modern medicine, forensics, and Darwinism.  We will also screen such early silent films as Broken Blossoms, inspired by Sherlock Holmes and set in East End of London, and most recent Sherlock Holmes movies and BBC production of Sherlock Holmes set in the 21st century of Iphone, internet, GPA, blog and crime scenes.
goals: 瞭解維多利亞時代重要的英國小說家及其時代, 如科學之發展、帝國之擴張以及與東方之關係
瞭解偵探小說之一文類
瞭解以十九世紀末及二十世紀初倫敦為背景之類型電影
介紹福爾摩斯至中國的翻譯以及福爾摩斯小說中對東方的描寫與再現
syllabus:
Week 1: Orientation

Week 2: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle: Life and Biography

Week 3: Screening of “Sherlock Holmes” (2008), and discussion

Week 4: Screening of BBC “Sherlock” (2008), episode 1, and discussion

Week 5: Screening of BBC “Sherlock” (2008), episode 2, and discussion

Week 6: Screening of BBC “Sherlock” (2008), episode 3, and discussion

Week 7: “The Dying Detective,” and tropical disease

Week 8, “The Pot of Caviare,” _Round the Fire Stories_

Week 9, “The Japanned Box,” _Round the Fire Stories_, Gothic fiction, and Japan

Week 10, “The Brown Hand,” _Round the Fire Stories_, and India

Week 11, “The Jelland’s Voyage,” _Round the Fire Stories_

Week 12, “The Speckled Band”

Week 13: “The Twisted Lips”

Week 14: “Illustrious Client”

Week 15: “The Red-Headed League”

Week 16: “The Blue Carbuncle”

Week 17: “The Engineer’s Thumb”

Week 18: presentation
